witchermod.description:
Professional monster hunters one and all, the School of the Wolf is looking to earn their place in a new land and settle their fortress there.
For more advanced players.
witchermod.quote: Where'd you complete your training? School of the Snail? Get moving its time to embark!
witchermod.post_selection_description: , a group of professional monster hunters.

swallow_buff.description: Swallow accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal

cooldown.description: Need to brew some new ones...will take some time.
Need to brew some new ones...will take some time.

thunderbolt_buff.description: Strenghtens the muscles, increasing damage done.

cooldown.description: Need to brew some new ones...will take some time.

maribor_forest_buff.description: Maribor Forest significantly increases maximum Endurance

blade_oil.description: Special oils applied to a witchers blade mean even minor cuts cause deceptively much damage

quen.description: Quen, also known as the Witcher's shield, grants a significant increase in defence while it is up.

quen_cooldown.description: Quen can not be used right now

witcher_resist_buff.description: After surviving the mutation process, the witcher has enhanced speed, strength, stamina and resistance to disease and poison.

worker_description.description: Acolytes perform the more menial tasks, hauling, harvesting, building and constructing buildings and items

initiate_description.description: The initiate has taken the first step on the way to become a witcher. Traps animals and leans to hunt monsters.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The first step on the path, the Initiate has started intensive physical training and sword drills, increasing weapon damage by 20%

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Knowing just how to put your feet down doesnt just make you faster, it makes you less likely to be hit like a chump!

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Anatomical knowledge ensures each strike deals maximum damage! (+60%)

damage_1_buff.description: The first step on the path, the Initiate has started intensive physical training and sword drills, increasing weapon damage by 20%

speed_buff.description: Knowing just how to put your feet down doesnt just make you faster, it makes you less likely to be hit like a chump!

damage_3_buff.description: Anatomical knowledge ensures each strike deals maximum damage! (+60%)

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A fast sword manouvre damaging multiple enemies all around.

mage_description.description: Those with the spark of chaos in them, learns about herbs and combat magic

witcher_talisman_recipe.description: Used to create a witcher from an initiate ready for the path.
witcher_talisman_recipe.flavor: "Finally, came the seventh day. The male awoke and opened his eyes, and his eyes were those of a viper..."

wildrye_juice_recipe.description: A volatile alchemical ingredient, Causes a fury in any that even touch a drop of it.
wildrye_juice_recipe.flavor: "Hitherto agitated by a sudden madness, he fell at once into deep stupor"

speargrass_sap_recipe.flavor: "His breathing grew loud and hoarse; sweat cold, clammy and malodorous appeared on his skin.."
speargrass_sap_recipe.description: A volatile alchemical ingredient, Named after the fact that if you imbibe it, it feels like spears stick you all over.

mothers_tears_recipe.description: A volatile alchemical ingredient, Normally leathal in concentrations greater than half a droplet...And this is a bottle full.
mothers_tears_recipe.flavor: "No more did he wake, nor did he scream...For two days more did symptoms not subside"

mage_workbench_recipe.description: used by the mage for the creation of items, various.

pile_of_scrolls_recipe.description: Scrolls containing various treaties and documentations.

mage_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the mage for rudementary experiments

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Immuun to most toxins, and superhuman speed and senses...that is, if you survive it.

fwitcher_description.requirements: Requires a lvl 6 Initiate to undergo the trial of the grasses

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The initiate has learned of the tools used by witchers, and now uses blade oils and bombs to fight his foes.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Quen, also known as the witchers shield, is a magical sign witchers can use to protect them from harm and hamper incoming blows.

kaer_morhen_armor.flavor: Nonsense," said the Witcher. "And what's more, it doesn't rhyme. All decent predictions rhyme.
kaer_morhen_armor.description: Made out of leather and iron, strong but light and manouverable.

cat_school_armor_basic.description: Light Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the cat

cat_school_armor_enhanced.description: Light Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the cat, improved over the basic version

cat_school_armor_grandmaster.description: Mastercrafted Light Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the cat

bear_school_armor_basic.description: Heavy-duty Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the bear

bear_school_armor_enhanced.description: Enhanced Heavy-duty Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the bear

bear_school_armor_grandmaster.description: Mastercrafted Heavy-duty Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the bear

mutation_table.description: Sturdy, cold and sterile. Used in mutation processes. Or as a bed for the more specialised sort of user.
mutation_table.flavor: "Sad albert...i didnt think we would even use this again" -Vesemir

bronze_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of bronze

iron_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of Iron

silver_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of Silver

steel_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of Steel

manticore_school_armor_basic.description: Versatile witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the manticore

manticore_school_armor_enhanced.description: Enhanced versatile witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the manticore

manticore_school_armor_grandmaster.description: Mastercrafted versatile witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the manticore

grindstone_ghost.description: Needed to make weapons with a razor sharp edge.

stone_shortsword_recipe.flavor: It worked for cavemen, it will have to do for you!

herbalist_description.description: Dedicated to academic persuits, specialising in biology and healing.

training_sword_initiate_recipe.description: Used to promote an acolyte into an initiate.

paper_recipe.description: Multiple sheets of paper, made out of wood pulp.

training_dummy_recipe.description: Made for sword training, tends not to last long.
training_dummy_recipe.flavor: "If you are not sharp, your sword will also be dull! Now! Once more!" -Unnamed swordmaster

fuel_holder_small_wooden_recipe.description: A Firewood Holder, made out of wood.

vodka_recipe.flavor: “Vodka is like water, but with consequences.” -Karel, Witcher Initiate
vodka_recipe.description: "A strong brew made from potatoes. Makes hearthlings happy but also quite tipsy! "

baked_potato_recipe.description: Exactly why you expect. A baked potato.

leather_strip_recipe.description: Leather strips, usefull for a variety of useages.

bronze_sword_witcher_iconic.description: A long blade made out of bronze

bronze_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of bronze

iron_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of iron

iron_sword_witcher_iconic.description: A long blade made out of iron

steel_sword_witcher.description: A long blade made out of steel

steel_sword_witcher_iconic.description: A long blade made out of steel

silver_sword_witcher.description: A long blade coated in Silver, a witchers blade

silver_sword_witcher_iconic.description: A long blade coated in Silver, a Witchers blade

training_sword_witcher_iconic.description: Used to train new Initiates and Witchers with

training_sword_witcher.description: Used to train new Initiates and Witchers with

training_sword_witcher_talisman.description: Used to promote an acolyte into an initiate.

basic_spellbook_talisman.description: Used to educate an accolyte to a Mage Aspirant

basic_spellbook.description: A basic magical attack, that can set enemies on fire.

training_sword_initiate_iconic.description: Used to train new Initiates and Witchers with

kaer_morhen_armor.description: A style of armour used by Witchers on the path

cloth_armor_iconic.description: Loose clothes allow witchers to move fast while fighting!

cloth_armor.description: Loose clothes allow witchers to move fast while fighting!

cat_school_armor_basic.description: Light Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the cat

cat_school_armor_enhanced.description: Light Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the cat, stonger than the regular version.

cat_school_armor_grandmaster.description: Mastercrafted Light Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the cat

bear_school_armor_basic.description: Heavy-duty Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the bear

bear_school_armor_enhanced.description: Heavy-duty Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the bear, stronger than the basic version.

bear_school_armor_grandmaster.description: Mastercrafted, heavy-duty Witcher armour. Favored by those of the school of the bear.

manticore_school_armor_basic.description: Medium Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the manticore for its abillity to hold ingredients and alchemical concoctions.

manticore_school_armor_enhanced.description: Enhanced Medium Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the manticore for its abillity to hold ingredients and alchemical concoctions.

manticore_school_armor_grandmaster.description: Grandmaster Witcher armour, favored by those of the school of the manticore for its abillity to hold ingredients and alchemical concoctions.

torch_iconic.description: Gives off heat and light, can be used to block a blow in an emergency

torch.description: Gives off heat and light, can be used to block a blow in an emergency

wooden_talisman.description: Barely more than a good luck charm.

wooden_talisman_iconic.description: Barely more than a good luck charm.

witcher_medallion_blessed.description: A Witcher's silver mediallion, vibrates in the presence of magic and danger.

witcher_medallion_blessed_iconic.description: Vibrates in the presence of Magic and danger.

witcher_medallion.description: A Witcher's silver mediallion, Not yet empowered.

stone_talisman.description: A rock with a hole in it is concidered magical by the local peasantry.

stone_talisman_iconic.description: A rock with a hole in it is concidered magical by the local peasantry.

witcher_eyes.description: Cat like eyes, enabling the Witcher to see in near-dark conditions.

potato_serving.description: Fast-growing, but pretty bland on its own.

cabbage_basket.description: A cabbage in a basket. Its that simple.

potato_crop.description: Fast-growing, but pretty bland on its own.

011.name: Rotten Cabbage
011.description: Rotten and stinks like the blazes

onion_crop.description: Onions, good to eat on their own, but better when baked or fried!

crystal_ball_ghost.description: Magical instrument of indeterminate nature, some say it can be used for long range communication

mega_cabbage.description: I think, you are going to need more sallads.

cabbage_basket.description: A cabbage in a basket. Its that simple.

vodka.description: Alcaholic drink, sure to give a buzz

potato_mash.description: Potatoes in water, mashed. Used to make Vodka

maribor_forest.description: Maribor Forest significantly increases maximum Endurance, it is predominantly used by witchers

swallow.description: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal

thunderbolt.description: Augments muscle power and thus damage dealt, this potion is recommended before fighting particularly resilient or heavily armored monsters.

dimeterium_ore.description: Destinctly anti-magic. can be forged into Dimeterium bars.

dimeterium_ingot.description: A rare metal that, when worked propperly, absorbs magical energies.

dimeterium_dust.description: Refined Dimeterium, processed into powdered form.

emerald_dust.description: Uncut Emerald, ground into powdered form.

diamond_dust.description: Uncut Diamond, ground into powdered form.

sapphire_dust.description: Uncut Sapphire, ground into powdered form.

amethyst_dust.description: Uncut Amethyst, ground into powdered form.

ruby_dust.description: Uncut Ruby, ground into powdered form.

mothers_tears.description: Highly unstable alchemical compound, needed for the Decoction of the grasses.

wildrye_juice.description: Highly unstable alchemical compound, needed for the Decoction of the grasses.

speargrass_sap.description: Highly unstable alchemical compound, needed for the Decoction of the grasses.

paper.description: sheets of paper, ready to write on.

leather_strip.description: A strip of leather, used to make other items.

camp_standard_witcher_ghost.description: As of yet, unimbued with power

town_banner_witcher_bear_ghost.description: A runestone imbued with elemental magic.

town_banner_witcher_cat_ghost.description: A runestone imbued with elemental magic.

town_banner_witcher_manticore_ghost.description: A runestone imbued with elemental magic.

mutation_table_ghost.description: Sturdy, cold and sterile. Used in mutation processes. Or as a bed for the more specialised sort of user.

witcher_talisman.description: Used to create a witcher from an initiate ready for the path.

small.description: A strongly regenerative witcher's potion. Can only be used by Witchers
